definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge

sentences.english: Vinegar is one of the best cleansers that I have used.
sentences.chinese: 醋是我用过的最好的一种清洁剂。

sentences.english: Also, mop your bathroom floor once a week with a bleach-based cleanser.
sentences.chinese: 每周还应用漂白清洁剂擦拭浴室地板。

sentences.english: There's rarely a need for toxic paint thinners and brush cleaners.
sentences.chinese: 有很少有有毒刷油漆稀释剂和清洁剂的需求。

sentences.english: To clean an instrument, use a damp cloth or mild, water based cleaner.
sentences.chinese: 请用湿布或柔和的水基清洁剂清洁仪器。

sentences.english: The rough cloth should be washed with the designated detergent.
sentences.chinese: 这些毛布要用指定的清洁剂进行清洗。

sentences.english: Do not clean the waterborne lacquer of the spray gun with the oily lacquer cleaner.
sentences.chinese: 严禁用油性漆清洁剂清洗水性漆喷枪。

sentences.english: Spray the cleaner directly on the cloth to avoid streaking and getting the cleaner on the upholstery.
sentences.chinese: 将清洁剂直接喷洒在布上以防溢射碰到汽车内饰。

sentences.english: Again, molecules of these detergents have a hydrophobic portion and a hydrophilic one.
sentences.chinese: 同样，这种清洁剂既有亲水基团又有疏水基团。

sentences.english: Do bathroom cleaners need to be so harsh that the fumes make me choke?
sentences.chinese: 浴室清洁剂的气味非要搞得弄浓烈的让人窒息吗？

sentences.english: Solubility:Soluble in methanol, ethanol. Hardly soluble in toluene, xylene.
sentences.chinese: 一种不能溶解的固体醇，用于制清洁剂。

sentences.english: If there is oil stains in foam detergent scrub, such as cleaning is very short.
sentences.chinese: 如有油迹等用泡沫清洁剂擦洗就好了，保洁很简略。

sentences.english: Products with high proportions of polyphosphates are called built detergents.
sentences.chinese: 含有大量聚磷酸盐的产品被称为改进型清洁剂。

sentences.english: This fragrant air freshener makes you sense a distinctive aroma all day long.
sentences.chinese: 这种芳香型空气清洁剂使您整天感到芳香扑鼻。

sentences.english: The freezing point of the windscreen cleaner can be read off here.
sentences.chinese: 可由此读取风挡清洁剂的凝固点。

sentences.english: Do not mess with the neutral detergent.
sentences.chinese: 不可乱用非中性清洁剂。
